conference.title: Women in Data Conference 2025
conference.tagline: "सङ्‍कल्प: Using data to turn promises into progress"

about.introduction: Join us for the prestigious conference celebrating and empowering women in the data science field. The Women in Data Conference 2025 brings together industry leaders, innovators, and aspiring data professionals.
about.description: This year's conference focuses on bridging the gender gap in data science while showcasing groundbreaking work by women leaders in the field. From artificial intelligence to data ethics, we'll explore the latest trends and innovations shaping our data-driven future.
objectives: Share knowledge and best practices in data science
Create networking opportunities for women in tech
Showcase successful women leaders in data
Inspire the next generation of data professionals

faqData.question: Who can participate?
faqData.answer: Anyone passionate about using data to address societal challenges is welcome! We encourage a diverse range of participants, regardless of gender, including students, professionals, and enthusiasts from various fields.

faqData.question: How many participants will be selected?
faqData.answer: Approximately 250 participants will be selected to ensure a meaningful and engaging experience for everyone involved.

faqData.question: How can I register?
faqData.answer: You can register for the conference by filling out the registration form here.

faqData.question: What is the registration fee?
faqData.answer: There is no registration fee for attending the Women in Data (WiD) Conference 2025.

faqData.question: I've registered! What happens next?
faqData.answer: Our team will review all registrations after the deadline. If selected, you will receive detailed information about the venue, schedule, and logistics via email.

faqData.question: Will there be food and swags?
faqData.answer: Absolutely! Participants will receive cool swag items, and we'll provide lunch and coffee throughout the event.

faqData.question: What is the schedule of the conference?
faqData.answer: The full schedule will be published soon. Stay tuned to the conference page and follow our updates on social media.

faqData.question: I live outside Kathmandu Valley. How can I join?
faqData.answer: Women living outside the Kathmandu Valley can apply for our travel and accommodation scholarship here. We are offering 35 exclusive scholarships for women participants traveling from outside the Kathmandu Valley.

faqData.question: What is the language of the conference?
faqData.answer: The sessions will primarily be conducted in Nepali, with English and sign language interpreters available to ensure inclusivity.

faqData.question: Where can I contact if I have more questions?
faqData.answer: Feel free to contact or reach out to us via any of our social media platforms: Facebook | LinkedIn | Twitter | Instagram.
